titleStmt.title: Here after foloweth the boke of Phyllyp Sparowe compyled by mayster Skelton Poete Laureate
Phyllyp Sparowe
titleStmt.author: Skelton, John, 1460?-1529.

publicationStmt.publisher: At the poultry by [R. Copland for] Rychard Kele,

notesStmt.note: Publisher's name and address from colophon; actual printer's name and conjectured publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
